advisory.name: RLBA-2022:5872
advisory.synopsis: sos bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for sos is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description:
The sos package contains a set of utilities that gather information from
system hardware, logs, and configuration files. The information can then be
used for diagnostic purposes and debugging.

fixes.description: Obfuscate all passwords from ovirt answer files [rhel-8.6.0.z]
